data.message: User fluorine better :) You make a JS Flow and let fluorine handle all the callbacks and dependencies on other flows ;) http://freshout-dev.github.io/fluorine/

Alaa, promises are not that hard for the most common cases (until you start using them for what they are made for, combining and intercepting them for example). Why not just embrace the promises? They are way much easier than their alternatives in other languages
